name: Strawberry Lip Gloss
description: A moisturizing lip gloss with a sweet strawberry flavor. This gloss adds a subtle pink tint and shine without being sticky. Made with natural ingredients that are safe for young skin.
ingredients: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Octyldodecanol, Silica, Microcrystalline Wax, Fragaria Ananassa (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Stevia Rebaudiana Extract, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Red 7 Lake.
howToUse: Apply a small amount to lips for a subtle shine. Can be worn alone or over lipstick. Reapply as needed.

name: Gentle Face Wash
description: A gentle foaming face wash that cleanses without drying. Perfect for young skin, this face wash removes dirt and oil while maintaining the skin's natural moisture balance.
ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Allantoin, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.
howToUse: Wet face with warm water. Apply a small amount to hands and work into a lather. Massage gently onto face, avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly with water.

name: Sparkle Nail Polish Set
description: A set of 5 sparkly nail polishes in fun, vibrant colors. These polishes are water-based and peel off easily, making them perfect for beginners and easy to remove without harsh chemicals.
ingredients: Aqua, Acrylates Copolymer, Polyurethane-11, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Various Colorants (depending on shade).
howToUse: Apply 1-2 thin coats to clean, dry nails. Allow to dry completely between coats. Peels off easily with warm water or can be removed with regular nail polish remover.

name: Fruity Body Mist
description: A light, refreshing body mist with a fruity scent. This alcohol-free formula is gentle on young skin and provides a subtle, sweet fragrance that lasts throughout the day.
ingredients: Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Fragrance, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.
howToUse: Spray onto body after bathing or throughout the day for a refreshing scent. Avoid spraying directly onto face or irritated skin.

name: Unicorn Bath Bombs
description: A set of 3 colorful, unicorn-themed bath bombs that create a magical bathing experience. Each bath bomb releases vibrant colors, a sweet scent, and moisturizing ingredients for soft skin.
ingredients: Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Epsom Salt, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Natural Colorants, Fragrance.
howToUse: Fill tub with warm water. Drop in one bath bomb and watch it fizz and release colors. Soak and enjoy the magical experience.

name: Glitter Hair Spray
description: A temporary hair spray that adds sparkle and shine to any hairstyle. This water-based formula washes out easily with shampoo and won't damage hair.
ingredients: Aqua, PVP, Glycerin, Polyethylene Terephthalate (Glitter), Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance.
howToUse: Shake well before use. Hold can 8-10 inches from hair and spray lightly for a subtle sparkle or more heavily for a dramatic effect. Washes out with regular shampoo.

name: Moisturizing Lotion
description: A light, non-greasy moisturizing lotion perfect for young skin. This gentle formula absorbs quickly and keeps skin soft and hydrated all day long.
ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
howToUse: Apply to clean, dry skin. Massage in gentle circular motions until fully absorbed. Can be used daily or as needed.

name: Shimmer Eyeshadow Palette
description: A palette of 12 shimmer eyeshadows in soft, wearable colors. These eyeshadows are gentle on sensitive eyes and wash off easily with water.
ingredients: Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Dimethicone, Magnesium Stearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, May Contain: Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides, Ultramarines.
howToUse: Apply with fingertip or eyeshadow brush. For a subtle look, apply a small amount. For more intensity, build up with additional layers. Removes easily with warm water and gentle cleanser.

name: Dr. Rashel Anti-Aging Sunscreen
description: A high-protection sunscreen with SPF 60, designed to prevent premature aging and shield skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays. Lightweight and non-greasy, suitable for daily use.
ingredients: Zinc Oxide, Octinoxate, Glycerin, Aloe Vera Extract, Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid
howToUse: Apply generously to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours.

name: Sepi White Strong Whitening Capsule Corrector
description: Intensive whitening corrector capsules that target dark spots and uneven skin tone. Contains advanced brightening agents for a radiant complexion.
ingredients: Niacinamide, Alpha-Arbutin, Vitamin C, Licorice Root Extract, Salicylic Acid
howToUse: Twist open capsule and apply serum to cleansed skin. Use nightly.

name: Golden Glow Lotion
description: An intensive half-cast lotion that enhances skin radiance and provides a natural golden tint. Hydrates while subtly bronzing the skin.
ingredients: Dihydroxyacetone (DHA), Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil
howToUse: Apply evenly to clean skin. Wash hands after use. Reapply for deeper color.

name: Feique 2-in-1 Herbal Extract Cream
description: A multitasking herbal cream that combines moisturizing and soothing properties. Infused with natural extracts to nourish and protect the skin.
ingredients: Chamomile Extract, Calendula, Aloe Vera, Olive Oil, Beeswax
howToUse: Apply to face and body as needed. Ideal for daytime use.

name: Ghost Bond Invisible Bonding Glue
description: Professional-grade adhesive for securing wigs, lace fronts, and hairpieces. Dries clear and provides a strong, long-lasting hold.
ingredients: Acrylic Polymer, Ethyl Acetate, Isopropyl Alcohol
howToUse: Apply thin layer to clean scalp or hairpiece. Press firmly for 30 seconds.

name: Huile White Now Triple Action Oil
description: A triple-action oil that brightens, moisturizes, and evens skin tone. Lightweight and fast-absorbing for all-day hydration.
ingredients: Rosehip Oil, Almond Oil, Vitamin E, Licorice Extract
howToUse: Massage into skin daily, focusing on dark areas.

name: Collagen Anti-Aging Serum
description: A potent serum with collagen and hyaluronic acid to reduce wrinkles, hydrate, and brighten skin. Targets fine lines and loss of elasticity.
ingredients: Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, Green Tea Extract
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to cleansed face before moisturizer.
